name: Plainly dices
description:
It is a dice game without the randomness of a dice (it's not too hard nor long (on purpose), but it may trick you). Just requires a keyboard.

I worked on it alone and thought many ideas, but this seemed the fastest and fast it was, but also had many more mini-games in mind to get new faces that I couldn't add in time. Anymay, at least looks decent and gave me some new knowledge. Hope you enjoy it ;)

Special thanks to Lemmino for lending his song "Parallax". Check his main channel (he makes some of the nicest edits of video that I use to see): https://www.youtube.com/user/Top10Memes/featured

By the way, you can check my youtube channel here (there I upload my music and little more): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3SVl7OFdGcDlmMZbRDHhMQ/featured
